titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 2023 NATO Summit in Vilnius, Lithuania, and expressing priorities related to transatlantic security and the NATO Strategic Concept.
A resolution celebrating the 2023 NATO Summit in Vilnius, Lithuania, and expressing priorities related to transatlantic security and the NATO Strategic Concept.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution celebrates the 2023 NATO summit in Vilnius, Lithuania and urges Turkey and Hungary to ratify Sweden's accession to NATO without further delay. It also encourages allies to (1) operationalize the 2022 NATO Strategic Concept, which includes countering Chinese aggressive and coercive behavior; (2) spend at least 2 percent of Gross Domestic Product on defense; and (3) support Ukraine.
